page.title: 10A MINSTERLEY MUM'S DAY
page.content: After the scramble of getting three children to school for 9 a.m., I help at Minsterley school with swimming lessons, which take place at our local pool at the Mary Webb school in Pontesbury. Then it is home to the housework, cleaning, washing, ironing etc. Fetching my children from school at 3.30. p.m. livens things up at home. As we discuss our daily events, I prepare food for us all, & my husband arrives home from working in Shrewsbury. Another mad rush as the whole family change into uniform & head fo the village hall where the church brigade meet. My husband & I are officers & my children keen members. Supper,children's bedtime & a few minutes to catch my breath before preparing for Friday.
